nodes.bodyText:
I'd prefer if margins/paddings used calc(#{$standard-spacing} RATIO) to keep things evenly spaced everywhere. $standard-spacing defaults to 16px, so divide by 2,3,4 to get what you need.
calc(#{$standard-spacing} / 2) = 8px
Would you prefer to expose standard spacing as a CSS Custom Property and access it directly in the component vs style it in scss?
